author: wn.com
title: New Seal of Excellence to increase quality of regional research funding (European Commission - Directorate-General ...
text: ( Source : European Commission - Directorate-General for Regional Policy ) The Commission is today launching a new initiative to ensure that taxpayer money is spent efficiently by improving the synergies between EU funding for regional policy
